price: 52. Kuwaannu siinnay Kitaabka (Towraadda iyo Injiilka) ka hor kani (Qur'aanka) - baa rumeyn17 waxa ku soo arooray (Qur’aanka).
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ مِن قَبۡلِهِۦ هُم بِهِۦ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
footnotes: 17. Waa mu’miniinta daacadda ah ee ku jira ehlu kitaabka dhexdooda.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna ātaynāhumu al-kitāba min qablihi hum bihi yu'minūna
